item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 16, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

25. The history of the epigraph from Appointment in Samarra (2022) (24 points | 9 comments)
26. FTC to launch investigation into Microsoft's cloud business (95 points | 55 comments)
